description: DSB-76 queries adjusted to return rows on TPC-DS SF100. DSB parameter values were out of range or too selective for standard TPC-DS data generation.

query010_multi.fix: Removed sales_price/list_price ratio filter (0.20-0.30), widened county list (10 common counties), widened i_manager_id 66-75 to 40-80
query010_multi.reason: Multi-channel EXISTS (store + web/catalog) too selective with 5 rare counties. Only 11 in store_sales, 0 also in web/catalog.

query031_multi.fix: Removed i_color filter (navajo/orchid), widened ca_state from 2 to 6 states
query031_multi.reason: Color filter (1.4% of items) + 2 states + 3-quarter self-join. Compound selectivity yielded 0 overlap.

query054_multi.fix: Replaced s_state list with actual TPC-DS SF100 store states, widened c_birth_year 1928-1941 to 1920-1960
query054_multi.reason: TPC-DS SF100 stores only in AL,GA,LA,MI,MO,OH,SC,SD,TN. DSB used AR,CO,IA,... where 0 stores exist.

query058_multi.fix: list_price 242-271 -> 50-80 (all 3 CTEs). Revenue BETWEEN constraints removed from final WHERE via AST (applied identically to both original and patch).
query058_multi.reason: list_price max 200 on store_sales (300 on cs/ws). 3-way (item_id,birth_year) channel join extremely selective. Revenue ±10% filter kills remaining 237 rows to 0. Dropping revenue filter is fair — both queries still compute identical aggregates.

query059_multi.fix: Replaced s_state list with actual TPC-DS SF100 store states
query059_multi.reason: DSB state list has 0 stores in TPC-DS SF100.

query083_multi.fix: Lowered return_amt/quantity ratio from 237-266 to 50-150 (all 3 return channels)
query083_multi.reason: return_amt/return_quantity max is 200.00. DSB filter 237-266 completely out of range.

query102_agg.fix: Widened i_manager_id to 1-100, ca_state from 5 to 10, i_category from 3 to 6, removed ws_wholesale_cost
query102_agg.reason: 8-table join (ss+ws same item+customer within 30d + inventory + demographics). Only 8 base matches before demographics.
